page.title: 07KIPPEN TENNIS CLUB
page.content: Kippen tennis club was officially opened on the 6th July 1985.It has two all-weather courts and is open from 9.00 a.m.-10.00 p.m.Monday -Saturday and from 1.00 p.m.-10.00 p.m.on Sunday There are about 200 members at present and this summer a number of successful competitions were held. The idea of a tennis club for Kippen started in October 1982 and,after the forming of a small committee,the successful application for grants,and much fund-raising,the excavations began.The courts were ready for play just when Wimbledon fever gripped Kippen and are still very busy. Committee:-President: Mr.G.Pritchard, Vice-President:Mr.I.Leith,Treasurer:Mr J.Gaywood,Secretary:Mrs. L.Macdonell, and Mr.A.Burnett
